assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Sweat chloride testing: Sweat chloride levels decrease below 60 mmol/litre or by at least 30% from baseline; If baseline levels lower than 60 mmol/litre, decrease by at least 30% or sustained absolute improvement in FEV1 â‰¥ 5%. - Updated Patient Assessment
